raw_body:
WIJESINGHE – GAMINI (Attorney-at-Law). Dearly beloved husband of Nelum,​ loving father of Mohan and Monourie,​ father-in-law of Lusantha and Tharanga,​ loving grandfather of Pahanya,​ Menara,​ Shavinya and Chethesh,​ loving sister of Mallika,​ expired. Cremation on Sunday,​ 11th February at 5.00 p.m. at General Cemetery,​ Rawathawatta,​ Moratuwa. No. 120,​ D.S. Wijesinghe Mawatha,​ Katubedda,​ Moratuwa. Phone No. 0112650309.
010477
